sen.j: 大西清右衛門（おおにし せいえもん）は、千家十職の釜師。
sen.e: Seiemon ONISHI was a Kamashi (craftsman who made kettles for the tea ceremony) of one of the ten craftsmen families for the Sen family.
Seiemon ONISHI was a Kamashi (craftsman who made kettles for use in tea ceremony) of one of the ten craftsmen families for the Sen family.
Seiemon ONISHI was a Kamashi (craftsman who made kettles for use in tea ceremony) of one of the ten craftsmen families for the Senke (House of Sen).
sen.cmt: 統一リストに基づき、the Sen family→the Senke (House of Sen)としました。

sen.j: 大西家は、室町時代後期から400年以上続く京釜師の家。
sen.e: The Onishi family are a family of Kyoto Kamashi who can trace their heritage for more than 400 years from the late Muromachi Period.
The Onishi family are a family of Kyoto Kamashi who can trace their heritage for more than 400 years from the late Muromachi Period.
The Onishi family are a family of Kyoto Kamashi who can trace their heritage for more than 400 years from the late Muromachi period.
sen.cmt: Periodの頭文字を小文字に変更

sen.j: 四代目当主が清右衛門をなのり、六代目以降九代目をのぞき、代々の当主は清右衛門という名を継いだ。
sen.e: The fourth family head called himself Seiemon and henceforth the head of every generation from the sixth head onwards (excluding the ninth head) took the name Seiemon.
The fourth family head called himself Seiemon and henceforth the head of every generation from the sixth head onwards (excluding the ninth head) took the name Seiemon.
The fourth family head called himself Seiemon and henceforth the head of every generation from the sixth head onwards (excluding the ninth head) took the name Seiemon.

sen.j: 京都市中京区の三条通釜座通（かまんざ）に工房があり、「大西清右衛門美術館」も併設されている。
sen.e: The factory is located on the Sanjyo Kamanza Street in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, where the "Onishi Seiwemon Museum" is also located.
The factory is located on Sanjyo Kamanza Street in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, where the "Onishi Seiwemon Museum" is also located.
The factory is located on the corner of Sanjo-dori Street and Kamanza-dori Street in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, where the "Onishi Seiwemon Museum" is also located.
sen.cmt: on Sanjyo Kamanza Street→on the corner of Sanjo-dori Street and Kamanza-dori Streetとしました。

sen.j: 現在は十六代清右衛門が当主。
sen.e: Currently, the 16th Seiemon is the family head.
Currently, the 16th Seiemon is the family head.
Currently, the 16th Seiemon is the family head.

sen.j: 十五代の長男として京都に生まれ、大阪芸術大学美術学部彫金科卒業。
sen.e: He was born as the first son of the 15th head and graduated the Metalwork Course, Crafts Department, Osaka University of Arts.
He was born as the first son of the 15th head and graduated the Metalwork Course, Crafts Department, Osaka University of Arts.
He was born as the first son of the 15th head and graduated the Metalwork Course, Crafts Department, Osaka University of Arts.

sen.j: 父が隠居の後、1993年に十六代清右衛門を襲名した。
sen.e: After his father retired, he succeeded the name and became the 16th Seiemon in 1993.
After his father retired, he succeeded the name and became the 16th Seiemon in 1993.
After his father retired, he succeeded the name and became the 16th Seiemon in 1993.
